title: Acura Launches Killer 2025 ADX Lease Deal for August

title: Jeep To Expand Hemi V8 Availability For SUVs
description: Not that long ago, it seemed like the iconic Hemi V8 engine used in multiple Stellantis products was living on borrowed time. description: Dodge is determined to pump up muscle car fans as it rolls out the new “SIXPACK-powered” version of its Charger line. title: Considering A New Electric Car? You're Not Alone

descriptionSummary: A widening disconnect between car dealerships and their customers has been revealed by a recent survey, which highlights the significant gap in understanding consumer sentiment among original equipment manufacturer dealerships.

title: Volkswagen Retires Touareg After 24 Years — Tayron to Replace It

descriptionSummary: The Volkswagen Touareg, a stalwart of the automaker's lineup for over 20 years, is set to make way for new models by 2026. Its retirement will pave the way for more affordable and versatile SUVs like the Tayron.

descriptionSummary: Embracing absurdity is essential for experiencing the thrill of the Slingshot. Despite its inexcusable noise and impractical design, this unconventional vehicle defies logic and leaves a lasting impression, providing an exhilarating taste of weightlessness on wheels.
